alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:38PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Eagle County through 515 PM MDT... At 438 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Aspen, or 36 miles east of Glenwood Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Eagle County, including the following locations... Meridith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
